titleStmt.title: By the King, a proclamation for the better government of His Majesties army and for the preventing the plundring, spoyling, and robbing of His Majesties subjects under any pretense whatsoever, upon paine of the punishments herein declared.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1625-1649 : Charles I)
Charles I, King of England, 1600-1649.

notesStmt.note: "Given at Our court at Reading, the 25 day of November, in the eighteenth yeare of Our reigne."
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
